00041 /// creates pseudo-2D-gel images from survey scan data 
00042 class PWIZ_API_DECL Pseudo2DGel : public MSDataAnalyzer
00043 {
00044     public:
00045 
00046     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Config
00047     {
00048         std::string label;
00049         float mzLow;
00050         float mzHigh;
00051         int binCount;
00052         float zRadius;
00053         bool bry;
00054         bool binSum;
00055         bool ms2;
00056         boost::shared_ptr<pwiz::peptideid::PeptideID> peptide_id;
00057 
00058         Config(const std::string& args);
00059         Config(const std::string& args,
00060                boost::shared_ptr<pwiz::peptideid::PeptideID> peptide_id);
00061     };
00062 
00063     Pseudo2DGel(const MSDataCache& cache, const Config& config);
00064 
00065     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface
00066     //@{
00067     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00068 
00069     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo,
00070                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const;
00071 
00072     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00073                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00074 
00075     virtual void close(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00076     //@}
00077 
00078     private:
00079     class Impl;
00080     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00081     Pseudo2DGel(Pseudo2DGel&);
00082     Pseudo2DGel& operator=(Pseudo2DGel&);
00083 };
00084 
00085 
00086 template<>
00087 struct analyzer_strings<Pseudo2DGel>
00088 {
00089     static const char* id() {return "image";}
00090     static const char* description() {return "create pseudo-2D-gel image";}
00091     static const char* argsFormat() {return "[args]";}
00092     static std::vector<std::string> argsUsage()
00093     {
00094         std::vector<std::string> result;
00095         result.push_back("label=xxxx (set filename label to xxxx)");
00096         result.push_back("mzLow=N (set low m/z cutoff)");
00097         result.push_back("mzHigh=N (set high m/z cutoff)");
00098         result.push_back("binCount=N (set histogram bin count)");
00099         result.push_back("zRadius=N (set intensity function z-score radius [=2])");
00100         result.push_back("bry (use blue-red-yellow gradient)");
00101         result.push_back("binSum (sum intensity in bins [default = max intensity])");
00102         result.push_back("ms2locs (indicate masses selected for ms2)");
00103         return result; 
00104     }
00105 };
